attributes.additional_details:
Bring back the death penalty for all;
Terrorists
islamic extremists
murders
rapists
cop killers
pedophiles.

Bring back public pubishments such as caning (proper caning) for offences like;
Aggravated forms of theft
Burglary
Assault
Threatening behaviour

In light of what has happened in the past, rapist getting a slap on the wrist.
Murderers getting "life" in prison but getting out in five years.
Islamists threatening the lives of all British people and being protected by the police.
 And now Islamists beheading a soldier, i bet they'll get of easy. Do not let it happen!
